name: Retro
description: Retro is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a nostalgic touch. Its box is painted in a vibrant orange hue, reminiscent of vintage electronics. The buttons and arms and legs are designed to resemble a cute cat, adding a touch of playfulness to its appearance. The screen features a classic display, reminding users of older oscilloscope models. To complete its retro style, Retro is equipped with stylish shades, giving it a cool and fashionable look.
